### trySchedule() {#a9c67d906d22a6018e3ff649bafed6a1a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::sandboxir::Scheduler::trySchedule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; Instrs)</>}>
Tries to build a schedule that includes all of <code>Instrs</code> scheduled at the same scheduling cycle.

This essentially checks that there are no dependencies among <code>Instrs</code>. This function may involve scheduling intermediate instructions or canceling and re-scheduling if needed. \\Returns true on success, false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/scheduler-h/#l00163">163</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/scheduler-h">Scheduler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/lib/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/scheduler-cpp/#l00189">189</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/lib/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/scheduler-cpp">Scheduler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### scheduleAndUpdateReadyList() {#a5b0bd84c79a35f0d585108a2683723b4}

<MemberDefinition

Schedules all nodes in <code>Bndl</code>, marks them as scheduled, updates the UnscheduledSuccs counter of all dependency predecessors, and adds any of them that become ready to the ready list.

The dependency graph is used by the scheduler to determine the legal ordering of instructions.

### ReadyList {#af51a5db50b03e4d90b83a4feb412f207}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="ReadyListContainer llvm::sandboxir::Scheduler::ReadyList">
This is a list-scheduler and this is the list containing the instructions that are ready, meaning that all their dependency successors have already been scheduled.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/scheduler-h/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/scheduler-h">Scheduler.h</a>.

### ScheduleTopItOpt {#a9b8a7e2d9b2579ea32b5826cd4cf169c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt;BasicBlock::iterator&gt; llvm::sandboxir::Scheduler::ScheduleTopItOpt</>}>
This is the top of the schedule, i.e.

the location where the scheduler is about to place the scheduled instructions. It gets updated as we schedule.
